Job Posting:171042 - Position: F25 Data Analyst (Intern) 171042 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2025 - Fall App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 07/02/2025 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 06/27/2025 02:06 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Address Line 1 City Postal Code / Zip Code Province / State Country iA Financial Group (Industrial Alliance) 988 West Broadway Vancouver V5Z 1K7 BC Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode 2025 - Fall F25 Data Analyst (Intern) 171042 Co-op Position Toronto, ON Canada 4 or 8 months To be confirmed Salary Currency CAD Salary Job Description JR10023664 Application Deadline: July 1, 2025 Salary Not Available, 0 Major List Data Analyst / Application Developer / Co-op Internship / Hybrid: 3 to 4 days a week in office / Toronto / 37,5 hours weekly / Starting in September 2025 Role Overview: We are seeking a motivated and detail-oriented Co-op Intern to join our trading team as a Data Analyst/Application Developer. This role will focus on building processes and software to collect financial data and analytics to support our trading strategies and decision-making processes. The successful candidate will gain hands-on experience in a dynamic trading environment and contribute to the development of data-driven insights. Key Responsibilities: • Develop and manage new and existing internal software tools to store, collect, process, display and output financial data. • Work with, adapt to and comprehend many different forms of data input and collection. • Assist in collecting, cleaning, and analyzing large datasets related to trading activities. • Develop and maintain data models and dashboards to monitor trading performance. • Collaborate with traders to build, test and implement software that enhances their trading abilities with data-driven tools. Prepare reports and presentations to communicate findings to the trading team. • What We Offer: • Hands-on experience in a fast-paced trading environment. • Mentorship from experienced professionals in the field. • Opportunities to develop technical and analytical skills. • A collaborative and supportive work culture. • Potential for future full-time opportunities. This offer appeals to you and you would like to be part of a dynamic team? Don't wait any longer and apply now! Job Requirements Qualifications: • Currently enrolled in a relevant undergraduate program (e.g., Finance, Data Science, Computer Science, Engineering). • Must complete a university-accredited internship in Fall 2025. • Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. • Expertise in data analysis tools and programming languages (e.g., Python, pandas, SQL) • Proficiency with data visualization tools (e.g., Power BI, Tableau, Snowflake, MS SQL Server). • Excellent communication and teamwork skills. • Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks. • Experience building software applications from scratch with proper software architecture. Experience in Bloomberg, VBA (an asset). • Citizenship Requirement N/A APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Special Application Instructions Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Application Link: https://ia.ca/en/carrieres/job/JR10023664 Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received. Students should submit their applications as soon as they are ready.
